title: Jameson 12 Year Old
text: This whiskey offers a taste promise of unrivalled quality & smoothness.

title: Jameson Gold
text: Takes its unique character from the small selection of traditional pot still whiskeys matured in virgin oak used in the blend.

title: Jameson 18 Year Old
text: A supreme example of the Jameson tradition of maturing whiskey in Spanish Oloroso sherry casks.

title: Jameson Rarest Vintage Reserve
text: The pick of the oldest whiskeys, combined with a rare and characterful pot still whiskey aged in specially selected port casks, to deliver a supreme taste experience.

title: Powers 12 Year Old
text: This reserve is chosen from specially selected whiskeys, aged from 12 to 24 years.

title: Redbreast 12 Year Old
text: The only aged Pure Pot still whiskey on sale today.

title: Knappogue Single Malt
text: Rich and smooth with a hint of citrus fruits.

title: Midleton Very Rare
text: This whiskey is aged between 12 and 25 years, & is matured exclusively in seasoned bourbon barrels.
